橉橉橉

橉字的基本解释

橉
lìn
古书上说的一种树，亦称“橝”或“橉筋木”，树高大，木质坚硬，可染绛色，叶子可酿酒。
门槛：“枕户橉而卧者，鬼神蹠其首。”
树皮。

橉字的汉语字典释义

[①]［lìn］
［《廣韻》良刃切，去震，來。］
［《廣韻》良忍切，上軫，來。］
(1)木名。
(2)门槛。

橉字的康熙字典解释

【辰集中】【木字部】　橉； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页552第28
【唐韻】【集韻】?良刃切，音吝。木名。【郭璞·江賦】橉?稹薄於潯涘。【本草】橉木，一名橝，生江南深山。燒灰淋汁以釀酒，主心腹癥瘕。亦可染色。　又【類篇】木皮曰橉。　又【廣韻】良忍切【集韻】【韻會】里忍切，?音嶙。【玉篇】楚人呼門限曰橉。【淮南子·汜務訓】枕戸橉而臥者，鬼神蹠其首。　又【博雅】橉砌也。　又【廣韻】牛車絕橉。　【正字通】無門限義，失考。

橉字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
橉字的起名意思

暂无。

Yan
Basic explanation of words
Yan
lìn
A kind of tree mentioned in ancient books, also known as "橝" or "橉 tendon wood". The tree is tall and has hard wood, which can be dyed crimson, and the leaves can be used to make wine.
Threshold: "Those who lie down on the pillow, the ghosts and gods lie on their heads."
Bark.
Yan
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［lìn］
["Guang Yun" cuts with a good blade, go to shake, come. ]
["Guangyun" Liang Renqie, Shang Zhen, come. ]
(1) Wooden name.
(2) Threshold.
Yan
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chen Ji] [Wood Character Department] 　橉; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 552 28
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Good blade cut, mean sound. Wooden name. [Guo Pu·Jiang Fu] Jian? Zhen is thinner than Xunchang. [Materia Medica] A scorpion tree, a scorpion, grows deep in the south of the Yangtze River. Burning the ash and pouring the juice to make wine, the main confidant's disease. Can also be dyed.　[Classes] Mupi said Fu.　[Guang Yun] Liang Renqie [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Hui] In Renqie,? Sound. [Jade articles] Chu people call the door limit and call the door. 【Huainanzi·Banwu Training】Those who lie on the pillow, the ghosts and gods lie on their heads.　[Bo Ya] It’s also a piece of cake.　[Guangyun] The bullock cart is superb.　【Zhengzitong】No threshold meaning, missed exam.
